ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel SDI DVR,  HDMI® Port for High Resolution Viewing options,  8 High Resolution Cameras with 1080p Resolution,  All-Metal Weatherproof Cameras for Indoor and Outdoor Use,  Up to 50 Feet of Night Vision in Total Darkeness and 120ft with Ambient Lighting,  100ft of Shielded RG-59 Cable for each Camera,  Free Q-See Apps for iPhone, iPad, Android, Blackberry and Windows Mobile,  PC and Mac Compatibility,  Email Alerts with Incident Snapshot,  Pre-Installed 2TB Hard Drives
Convenient Backup: Transfer video files from the surveillance system to a PC, Flash Drive or USB Hard Drive in order to free-up space for new video while retaining important footage
Kit Includes: 18 month Q-See Warranty & Lifetime Technical Support,  8-Channel Digital SDI with 2TB Hard Drive,  (8) High Definiton SDI Cameras,  (8) 100ft RG-59 Shielded Cable,  (2) 4-way camera power adapter for efficient installation,  USB Mouse and Remote Control,  CD-Rom with Remote Viewing Software and Manual,  Power supply for DVRs,  RJ-45 Ethernet Cable,  Standard HDMI® Cable,  BNC to RCA adapter
Live Display Resolution and Frame Rate: 1920×1080, 30 FPS per camera (real-time),  Playback Resolution: 1080p (1920×1080 120 FPS total/ 15 FPS per camera),  Recording Frame Rate: 1080p (1920×1080 120 FPS total/ 15 FPS per camera )
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See 8 Channel HD SDI Security System with 2TB Hard Drive and 8 High Resolution Cameras
